events.message: The customer reported a collision involving their vehicle on April 30th, requesting to file an insurance claim for the damages incurred.
The claim was categorized under Auto Accident after reviewing the initial report and confirming it involved car damage due to a vehicle collision.
An insurance agent was assigned to handle the case to facilitate communication and assist the customer with next steps directly.
Acknowledgement of the claim was sent to the customer promptly, ensuring they were informed that the claim process has commenced.
The agent requested the customer to submit photos of the vehicle damage, police report, and repair estimates to proceed with the investigation.
Customer submitted all requested documents, including detailed photos and the official police report, helping to expedite the claim process.
Internal team began the investigation regarding the claim, focusing on verifying damages and validating the authenticity of submitted paperwork.
The investigation concluded successfully, confirming the liability and extent of damages consistent with the accident report provided.
A settlement offer was proposed to the customer based on the assessed damages and policy coverage terms for their vehicle repair.
Customer responded with positive feedback regarding the settlement terms and expressed satisfaction with the communication throughout the process.
The claim was officially approved, ensuring the customer’s repair costs would be covered under their existing auto insurance policy.
Insurance payment was issued to the customer’s preferred account, facilitating timely repairs on their damaged vehicle.
The claim case was officially closed after successful payment and confirmation from the customer that repairs were completed satisfactorily.
All claim files and documents have been archived securely for future reference and compliance with insurance record-keeping policies.
